alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SOUTHERN DEKALB COUNTY UNTIL 315 PM CDT... At 230 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Sand Rock, or 11 miles south of Rainsville, moving east at 15 mph. Penny size hail and winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible with this storm. Locations impacted include... Fort Payne, Crossville, Lebanon, Collbran, Dog Town, Adamsburg, Peeks Corner, Little River Canyon NP, Skirum and Desoto State Park.
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike several miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
